channel.title: CVE Feed for xpeedstudio -- MetForm – Contact Form, Survey, Quiz, & Custom Form Builder for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for xpeedstudio -- MetForm – Contact Form, Survey, Quiz, & Custom Form Builder for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-2791|2024-04-02T05:32:49.050Z -- xpeedstudio -- metform%20%E2%80%93%20contact%20form%2C%20survey%2C%20quiz%2C%20%26%20custom%20form%20builder%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Metform Elementor Contact Form Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's widgets in all versions up to, and including, 3.8.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
